Name: 时空梦魇Ⅰ代号608
About the game: This game is a puzzle, thriller, horror, visual novel, RPG game, the overall style belongs to the pixel steampunk style In the steampunk world of the Apocalypse, detective Alice Veil is investigating a serial murder, Unfortunately is in the investigation by the killer shot dead, however everything is just beginning..... The difficulty of the game needs to be reasonable allocation of collected resources, low level players do not download experience If you encounter any problems with the game, please feel free to comment to me on the Steam community and I will fix them immediately Since this is an experience version, I hope you can give me more feedback so that I can keep improving the quality of the game You can also follow the author bilibili's official account for feedback The main language of this work is simplified Chinese. If there are any grammar errors in other languages, please leave a message in the Steam community and I will fix them immediately To switch to the language category, please enter the Steam library right click on the game, go to the properties to select the language
